profile:
When we say we go the extra mile, we mean it. As a full-service junk removal company operating in Ontario for over ten years, we know your needs are different so we offer a breadth of services and tailor our strategy to your unique situation. From furniture removal, renovation waste clean up, office and estate clear outs, recycling, certified destruction and recycling of hard drives, circuit boards, light bulbs and more, Capital Junk is your one-stop shop for recycling and full-service disposal from your home or business.


We recognize that some circumstances can make the process of junk removal necessary, but still difficult on an emotional level. That’s why we’re committed to handling your possessions with the utmost respect. When it comes to junk removal, your “junk” isn’t worthless to us. Our staff have a 3-step approach to handling your items: whatever we cannot donate to local charities we take to be recycled and anything that is not recyclable or reusable is sorted and properly disposed of.


Junk Ninja is always on time for your appointment. When you’re scheduled you are provided with a 2-hour arrival window and a convenient 15 minute courtesy call the day of. When our professional workers step out of the truck, all you have to do is point to the items and they'll give you an estimate based on volume. Our rates include all the labour, disposal and transportation costs associated with clearing out your clutter or unwanted furniture. The prices are up-front and the work doesn't begin until you give us the go ahead.


As a customer of Capital Junk, you'll notice right away that we are relentless in our pursuit of complete client satisfaction. We will never leave a job site until we've removed every last bit of junk and can be sure that you’re happy with the superior quality of our work – easy, fast, and professional.


No matter the challenge, we can and will figure it out. We succeed because we always try. There's no need to be nervous about a "messy" basement or cluttered garage. Capital Junk takes junk removal seriously and we don't judge. We’ll do whatever it takes. 


Why? Because we care. We care about our work, our customers, and their discarded items.


We service Ottawa, Gatineau and surrounding. We also service Kitchener, Cambridge, Waterloo, Guelph, Paris, Halton Hills, Georgetown, Milton, Orangeville, Oakville, Burlington, London and more!

profile:
There isn’t much that we won’t take, with the exception of hazardous waste and materials. Let us know what you want to get rid of and we’ll handle the rest. We offer the best junk removal prices in Ottawa. We collect the items you don’t want and take them to the Ottawa dump. 

Some of the items we handle for residential clients includes but is not limited to:
Appliances
Furnitures
Electronics
Clothes
Cardboard and other recyclables
Carpeting
Scrap metal
Ceramics
Tires
Garage Items
Yard waste 
Lumber
We understand that commercial and industrial clients have different needs than residential clients. We’ve also got you covered! Whether you’re looking to empty an office or clear construction waste – We love a challenge! Some of the items we handle for commercial and industrial clients includes but is not limited to:
Office furniture
Trash and debris
Construction materials and waste
Cardboard and other recyclables 
Lumber
Industrial metals
Contact us today for your free quote below

We handle all kinds of items. Whether it be electronics, appliances, furniture, any recycling. We have the right equipment and workmanship to get the job as smooth as possible. Let us do the heavy lifting. Our team is professional and highly trained for taking care of all kinds of projects. So if you or anyone you know needs our junk removal services. We are located in Ottawa and can’t wait to hear from you. 

Customer Service
We love taking the time to know our customers. It’s our pleasure to help remove unwanted and wasteful items from your home or business. We always recycle when possible
